CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the absorption spectrum in DCM solution , the one in solid film displayed a red - shift absorption peak at 602 nm and an additional shoulder at 655 nm besides the highenergy peak.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DCM solution |
| solid film |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "DCM solution" and "solid film".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DCM solution |
| solid film |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "DCM solution" and "solid film". The term "highenergy peak" is not a material name, but rather a description of a feature in the absorption spectrum. Therefore, it should not be included in the list of material names.
